25.2.0-pre1.name: February '25 (pre 1)
25.2.0-pre1.photoCaption: LB4FH at POTA NO-2526, LABOTA B/LA 0004
changes: Option to toggle RST fields

25.1.0.name: January '25
changes: Activate with more than one operator
Support for Winter Field Day 2025
Allow toggling of QRZ images (happy Dan?)
Better handling of operator callsign in operation title
Include base frequency in ADIF export when only band was specified
Include contest exchange in ADIF export
Fixed lookup of callsign notes when offline
Fixed WWBOTA spots
Fixed historic ADIF and QSON imports

24.12.2.name: December '24
changes: Fixed WWBOTA input and grid
Fixed colors in location screen in forced dark mode
Fixed missing dates for historic records

24.12.1.name: December '24
changes: Fixed issue with spots for multi-operator activations

24.12.0.name: December '24
changes: First steps at making the app more accessible for sight-impaired users
Add HamQTH callsign lookup (by M1SDH)
Merge spots of multi-operator activations (by M1SDH)
Use spot comments to confirm POTA contacts (by NA7DO)
WWBOTA cluster spots (by M1SDH)
Improve operation title handling
Faster data downloads for POTA, SOTA and WWFF
Ignore grid AA00aa
Operation Location screen
Preliminary work for Sync Service
Make Anna happy and allow using number keys on spotting comments
Fix problems with external keyboards on Android
Fix bugs in various input fields
Fix lookup of portable calls
Fix reference prefix for ITABOTA (by M1SDH)
Fix SOTA self-spot reliability (by M1SDH)

24.11.2.name: November '24
changes: Fix crash for some devices when opening an operation

24.11.1.name: November '24
changes: Fix problems with name lookups and POTA references

24.11.0.name: November '24
changes: New Operation Data Screen, for exports, imports and sharing
SOTA Hunter log export
Updated SOTA APIs
Combining spots from different sources as one
HamDB lookups (free, but US, Canada and Germany only)
Link to our new Forums
Cleaned up app internals for better performance
Menu option to 'Lookup all QSOs' in an Operation
Changing activity references (POTA, SOTA, etc) updates grid unless set manually
Fixed crash when loading data files on devices with limited RAM
Fixed Cabrillo export bug
Fixed call lookup, notes and history bugs
Fixed `QRT` spotting command

24.10.3.name: October '24
changes: NY QSO Party (Experimental)

24.10.2.name: October '24
changes: Fixed bugs related to retrieval of GPS locations
Fixed ADIF export comments field name
Fixed band plan for Australia and South Africa to include all modes in 30m

24.10.1.name: October '24
changes: Fixed crash on operations where all QSOs are deleted

24.10.0.name: October '24
changes: Count DXCC entities, US States and Canadian Provinces
Map markers now use colors for bands
Self-spotting shortcuts `QRV`, `QSY` and `QRT`
Use the [send] button to trigger shortcuts
Added vibration to number keys
Fixes for GMA spotting and log file name
Improvements in SOTA and WWFF log exports
Scoring summaries for ECA, ELA and WWBOTA
Guess modes based on frequency
General Setting to use 8-digit grids

24.9.7.name: September '24 (24.9.7)
changes: Fixed bug when doing for calls with multiple aliases on QRZ.com

24.9.6.name: September '24 (24.9.6)
changes: More… yes, you guessed it… spotting fixes. This time in split view mode.

24.9.5.name: September '24 (24.9.5)
changes: More spotting fixes
Include notes in ADIF, even when there is no title

24.9.4.name: September '24 (24.9.4)
changes: Fixed crash when selecting certain spotted calls

24.9.3.name: September '24 (24.9.3)
changes: Further fixes for crash in Callsign Notes Settings

24.9.2.name: September '24 (24.9.2)
changes: Fixed crash in Callsign Notes Settings
Fixed crash when looking up certain callsigns
Fixed bug preventing clearing of callsigns

24.9.1.name: September '24 (24.9.1)
changes: Fixed bug where QSO names and locations were not being saved.

24.9.0.name: September '24
changes: Counting and scoring QSOs for an Operation
Access to spots from Home Screen
Filter spots by Continent
Split view can now be resized
Add QSOs to an operation from an ADIF file
Operation Title and Notes
Fixed bugs related to loading Callsign Notes
Date and time input fields now accept shorter formats

24.8.0.name: August '24
changes: Much improved Spots Screen
SOTA Spots!!!
SOTA Self-spotting (by M1SDH)
WWFF Spots (by M1SDH)
Input for TX Power (by NA7DO)
Self-spotting command shortcut (‘SPOTME’)
Add QSOs to an operation from an ADIF file (Dev Mode only, for now)
Miscelaneous bug fixes

Leftie Mode
